hibernate-mapping.query: from ServiceMethod s where s.Service.Application.Id = :applicationId and s.MappedToAction.Query is not null
from ServiceMethod s where s.Service.Application.Id = :applicationId and s.MappedToAction.StoredProcedure is not null and s.MappedToAction.StoredProcedure.IsReturningRefCursor = 1
from ServiceMethod s where s.Service.Name like :serviceName and s.Name like :name and s.Service.Application.Id = :applicationId
from ServiceMethod sm where sm.RequestMap.Id = :propertyMapId or sm.ResponseMap.Id = :propertyMapId
